text:
Hi,
Does anyone use the HubSpot tool for SEO ?
Is it a good practice to use it (instead of Google analytics for example ?)
best,

Hey <@U03016GSEQ6>
Do you mean SEO reports (Content > SEO) that HubSpot generates?

Basically, everything in there is based on the <https://pagespeed.web.dev/|Google page speed test> just in the HubSpot portal.

Google Analytics is a bit different. Its functionality overlaps with the HubSpot analytics for each website/landing page.
